mapper.sql: ${alias}.ITEM_STATEINST_ID itemStateinstId, ${alias}.APPLYINST_ID applyinstId, ${alias}.SERIESINST_ID seriesinstId, ${alias}.STAGEINST_ID stageinstId, ${alias}.EXEC_STATE_ID execStateId, ${alias}.PARENT_STATEINST_ID parentStateinstId, ${alias}.STATEINST_SEQ stateinstSeq, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_HI_ITEM_STATEINST ahis where ahis.ITEM_STATEINST_ID in #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_HI_ITEM_STATEINST (ITEM_STATEINST_ID, APPLYINST_ID, SERIESINST_ID, EXEC_STATE_ID, PARENT_STATEINST_ID, STATEINST_SEQ, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME,ROOT_ORG_ID, STAGEINST_ID) values (#{itemStateinstId}, #{applyinstId}, #{seriesinstId}, #{execStateId}, #{parentStateinstId}, #{stateinstSeq}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime},#{rootOrgId}, #{stageinstId})
mapper.update:
update AEA_HI_ITEM_STATEINST
ITEM_STATEINST_ID = #{itemStateinstId},
APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId},
SERIESINST_ID = #{seriesinstId},
STAGEINST_ID = #{stageinstId},
EXEC_STATE_ID = #{execStateId},
PARENT_STATEINST_ID = #{parentStateinstId},
STATEINST_SEQ = #{stateinstSeq},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where ITEM_STATEINST_ID = #{itemStateinstId}
